title: Afghan-Eck
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Fast food, Middle Eastern, Afghan, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Family-run restaurant serves traditional Afghan cuisine and offers plenty of vegan choices. Staff is knowledgeable about veganism. Some vegan menu items include various dishes of rice with lentils, eggplant and more. Try the Afghan falafel. On Fridays only serves a vegan dish with leeks. The food is freshly made in the morning and individually warmed for you at noon. Portions are generous. Located near the Siegesdenkmal - about a 7 minute walk from the cathedral.
